_description: An invitation to a tournament — four monorhyming lines

BLAdd31922.Transcription: Who so that wyll hym selff applyeTo passe the tyme of youth IolyAuaunce hym to þe companyeOf lusty bloddys & cheualryoff lusty bloddys and cheualry
BLAdd31922.Note: Words repeated with notes for three further singing parts.
